item.title: Create an Industrial Automation Solutions Website
item.description: I want to consolidate my experience and knowledge in the field of automation, and Iâ€™ve decided to do this by creating a website. I also hope it can serve as a starting point for offering consulting services. Since this website is content-focused, I chose to build it using Docusaurus and deployed it on Cloudflare. I spent an hour setting up the template and configuring automated deployment. You can now access it by clicking here.
